div.p: This value set contains 3 concepts

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on TaskStatus v4.0.1 (CodeSystem)
The task is ready to be acted upon and action is sought.
The potential performer has agreed to execute the task but has not yet started work.
The potential performer who claimed ownership of the task has decided not to execute it prior to performing any action.

description.value: This is the status of the prescription for the coprescriber

tr.td: Preparation and administration of medication to chronical psychiatric patient

display.value: Preparation and administration of medication to chronical psychiatric patient

div.p: This value set contains 11 concepts

div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px
div.p: Expansion based on:
The request has been created but is not yet complete or ready for action.
The request is in force and ready to be acted upon.
The request (and any implicit authorization to act) has been temporarily withdrawn but is expected to resume in the future.
The request (and any implicit authorization to act) has been terminated prior to the known full completion of the intended actions. No further activity should occur.
The activity described by the request has been fully performed. No further activity will occur.

This request should never have existed and should be considered 'void'. (It is possible that real-world decisions were based on it. If real-world activity has occurred, the status should be "revoked" rather than "entered-in-error".).

The authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this request. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which.

description.value: This is the status of the prescription

div.p: This value set contains 8 concepts

div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px
div.p: Expansion based on:
**Definition:**The patient currently has a medical condition for which the vaccine is contraindicated or for which precaution is warranted.
**Definition:**There was no supply of the product on hand to perform the service.
**Definition:**The patient or their guardian objects to receiving the vaccine.
Client deceased.
**Description:**The patient is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
**Definition:**Therapy has been changed and new prescription issued
**Definition:**Contraindication identified

description.value: Codes to explain the current status of a referral prescription.

description.value: Codes to define the high level category for a referral prescription. SNOMED-CT codes in this valueset are just a draft proposal to give a general idea - pending an official valueset.
